snippet: Erik Spoelstra insists that the Heat are not worn down, even though the Thunder looked fresher, faster, looser and more precise, outscoring the Heat 58-40 in the second half of Game 1.
abstract: Miami Heat coach Erik Spoelstra insists that his team is not worn out, even though the Oklahoma City Thunder looked fresher, faster, looser and more precise, outscoring the Heat 58-40 in the second half of Game 1.
lead_paragraph: Erik Spoelstra insists that the Heat are not worn down, even though the Thunder looked fresher, faster, looser and more precise, outscoring the Heat 58-40 in the second half of Game 1.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Finals — Fatigue Is Not a Factor, Heat Coach Says
headline.main: Fatigue Is Not a Factor, Heat Coach Says
headline.print_headline: Heat’s Coach Insists His Team Is Not Worn Out
